text:
[Verse]
Sun shining on the rooftop
Wind blowing through my hair
Feet dangling off the edge now
No room for any care

[Verse 2]
City sounds all around me
Life moving down below
Lost in my little moment
In my rooftop show

[Chorus]
On the rooftop we are free
Just the sky and you and me
Feel the beat beneath our feet
Rooftop dream we can't defeat

[Verse 3]
Stars rising in the twilight
Moon taking up the stage
Lights twinkle down the skyline
Turning a brand-new page

[Bridge]
Laughter echoing so clear
Memories we hold dear
Whisper words within the night
Everything just feels so right

[Chorus]
On the rooftop we are free
Just the sky and you and me
Feel the beat beneath our feet
Rooftop dream we can't defeat
title: On the Rooftop
